entry.title: I felt the World Change: The Release of ChatGPT

link.title: I felt the World Change: The Release of ChatGPT

entry.summary: On December 4th, 2022, I watch the world change. As I sat in front of my computer, I couldn’t believe my eyes. As I continued to use GPT, I was struck by how intuitive and user-friendly it was. I didn’t need to have any prior knowledge or experience with language models to be able to use it effectively. Its user interface was simple and straightforward, making it easy for anyone to start using ...

entry.title: My Hello World
entry.summary: hello world Does it ever start without a Hello World?
